title: European Stocks Start 2026 at Record High; UK FTSE Tops 10,000
description: European stocks began the new year at all-time highs, benefiting from optimism around economic growth, while miners were boosted by higher commodity prices.
content: European stocks began the new year at all-time highs, benefiting from optimism around economic growth, while miners were boosted by higher commodity prices.
